oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: What is said to people whose actions are disagreeable (or 'not nice'). The person is cursed and others are angry with him. The people question his treatment of them. 1) This story is found in Book V-24.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: What is said to a person whose actions are disagreeable
